description_for_human: Search Czech government contracts (Registr smluv) and insolvency proceedings via Hlídač státu.

functions.name: searchContracts
functions.description: Search Czech government contracts in Registr smluv by IČO (ico:12345678), company name, or free text.

functions.name: getContractDetail
functions.description: Get full detail of a government contract including parties, amounts, attachments, and issues.

functions.name: searchInsolvencyCases
functions.description: Search Czech insolvency proceedings by IČO (ico:12345678), company/person name, or court file number.

functions.name: getInsolvencyDetail
functions.description: Get full detail of an insolvency case including debtors, creditors, administrators, and documents.
